mapper.sql:
FROM item a JOIN member b on a.member_mmSeq = b.mmSeq JOIN itemOption c on a.itemSeq = c.item_itemSeq WHERE 1=1 AND itDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND itTitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.itemSeq ,a.itTitle ,b.mmNickname ,c.itemPrice
AND b.mmRank = 20 ORDER BY a.itemSeq DESC
SELECT a.* FROM item a WHERE 1=1 AND itemSeq = #{itemSeq}
SELECT seq ,type ,defaultNy ,sort ,path ,originalName ,uuidName FROM espresso.itUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND pseq = #{itemSeq} ORDER BY type, sort
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET itemDelNy = 1 WHERE itemSeq = #{itemSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE item, itemOption FROM item JOIN itemOption on item.itemSeq = itemOption.item_itemSeq WHERE item.itemSeq = #{itemSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM code a WHERE 1=1

SELECT d.mmNickname ,b.itTitle ,c.itemPrice ,e.uuidName ,e.path FROM purchase a JOIN item b on a.item_itemSeq = b.itemSeq JOIN itemOption c on a.item_itemSeq = c.item_itemSeq JOIN member d on a.member_mmSeq = d.mmSeq LEFT JOIN itUploaded e on a.itemSeq = e.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND a.member_mmSeq = #{sessSeq}

SELECT a.itTitle ,c.itemPrice ,d.uuidName ,d.path FROM item a JOIN member b on a.member_mmSeq = b.mmSeq JOIN itemOption c on a.itemSeq = c.item_itemSeq LEFT JOIN itUploaded d on a.itemSeq = d.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND b.mmSeq = #{sessSeq}
